message: Should i try to get a CEH(certified ethical hacker) certification? what are the advantages? would it be helpfull at all for an embedded systems designer/ reverse engineer?
I dunno, search job boards and see if any listings require CEH for the position.  That'll be a okay gauge of industry acceptance.
Ethics? When did THAT get anybody what they want? Bah! Who's the governing body? Isn't it a subjective & personal criteria?
